home.name: Your Apartment
home.description: A small studio apartment. It's modest but clean. Your bed sits in the corner, and a small kitchenette lines one wall. Sunlight streams through a single window overlooking the street.

street.name: Main Street
street.description: The heart of downtown. Cars pass by occasionally. You can see the gym to the north, a small café to the east, the bank to the south, your apartment building to the west, and more shops down the road.

gym.name: 24/7 Fitness Gym
gym.description: A well-equipped gym with free weights, machines, and cardio equipment. The smell of rubber and determination fills the air. Motivational posters line the walls.

cafe.name: Coffee Bean Café
cafe.description: A cozy café with wooden tables and the rich aroma of fresh coffee. A few customers sit working on laptops. The barista is wiping down the counter.

bank.name: First National Bank
bank.description: A modern bank with polished floors and professional atmosphere. Tellers work behind glass windows. You see a loan officer at a desk in the corner.

downtown_plaza.name: Downtown Plaza
downtown_plaza.description: A bustling plaza with shops, restaurants, and people going about their day. The central fountain provides a peaceful sound amidst the urban energy. You can see a bookstore, a restaurant, and a tech store.

bookstore.name: Novel Ideas Bookstore
bookstore.description: A charming independent bookstore with shelves reaching to the ceiling. The scent of paper and coffee mingles pleasantly. Cozy reading nooks invite you to stay awhile.

restaurant.name: The Golden Fork Restaurant
restaurant.description: An upscale restaurant with elegant décor and ambient lighting. The aroma of gourmet cuisine fills the air. White-clothed tables are set with fine silverware.

tech_store.name: TechHub Electronics
tech_store.description: A modern electronics store showcasing the latest gadgets and computers. Display units glow with demonstrations. Knowledgeable staff are ready to assist customers.

park.name: Central Park
park.description: A peaceful green space in the heart of the city. Trees provide shade over walking paths. Families play on the grass, and joggers pass by regularly. A maintenance worker tends to the flower beds.

park_pavilion.name: Park Pavilion
park_pavilion.description: A covered pavilion with benches and picnic tables. Community events are often held here. A bulletin board displays local announcements and opportunities.

office_building.name: Downtown Office Building
office_building.description: A sleek glass office building housing various businesses. The lobby features modern art and polished marble floors. Professionals in business attire move purposefully through the space.
